com.novell.ldapchai.cr
Class CrFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.novell.ldapchai.cr.CrFactory

public final class CrFactory
extends Object

Factory for generating Challenges, ChallengeSets and ResponseSets.

Author:
Jason D. Rivard

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

newChallenge

public static Challenge newChallenge(boolean required,
                                     String challengeString,
                                     int minLength,
                                     int maxLength,
                                     boolean adminDefined)
Create a new challenge data object.

Parameters:
required - if the challenge is a required or random.
challengeString - The text of the ChallengeString. May be null if not admin defined.
minLength - The minimum length of the challenge string
maxLength - The maximum length of the challenge string
adminDefined - If the challengeString is defined by admin or created by user.
Returns:
A Challenge object suitable for constructing a new ChallengeSet.

newChallengeSet

public static ChallengeSet newChallengeSet(Collection<Challenge> challenges,
                                           Locale locale,
                                           int minimumRands,
                                           String identifer)
                                    throws ChaiValidationException
Create a new Challenge Set. No method is provided for writing this challenge set to the directory, rather this is provided as a conveneice to use the Chai APIs in cases where the Challenge Set is read by some other means (such as a configuration file).

Parameters:
challenges - A collection of Challenge objects
locale - A local associated with the challenge set (may be null).
minimumRands - Minimum random values required
identifer - A string identifier of the challenge set.
Returns:
A functional ChallengeSet.
Throws:
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the challenge set data, such as more randoms required then exist

newResponseSet

public static ResponseSet newResponseSet(Map<Challenge,String> challengeResponseMap,
                                         Locale locale,
                                         int minimumRandomRequired,
                                         ChaiUser user,
                                         String csIdentifier)
                                  throws ChaiValidationException
Create a new ResponseSet. The generated ResponseSet will be suitable for writing to the directory by calling the ResponseSet's ResponseSet.write(CrMode) method.

Parameters:
user - User to associate the response set with
challengeResponseMap - A map containing Challenges as the key, and string responses for values
locale - The locale the response set is stored in
minimumRandomRequired - Minimum random responses required
csIdentifier - Identifier from ChallengeSet (see ChallengeSet.getIdentifier()
Returns:
A ResponseSet suitable for writing.
Throws:
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the response set data, such as more randoms required then exist

readAssignedChallengeSet

public static ChallengeSet readAssignedChallengeSet(ChaiUser theUser,
                                                    Locale locale)
                                             throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                                                    ChaiOperationException,
                                                    ChaiValidationException
A convience wrapper for readAssignedChallengeSet(com.novell.ldapchai.provider.ChaiProvider, com.novell.ldapchai.ChaiPasswordPolicy). This method will first read the user's password policy using ChaiUser.getPasswordPolicy(),

Parameters:
theUser - ChaiUser to read policy for
locale - Desired locale
Returns:
A valid ChallengeSet if found, otherwise null.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the challenge set data, such as more randoms required then exist

readAssignedChallengeSet

public static ChallengeSet readAssignedChallengeSet(ChaiUser theUser)
                                             throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                                                    ChaiOperationException,
                                                    ChaiValidationException
A convience wrapper for readAssignedChallengeSet(com.novell.ldapchai.provider.ChaiProvider, com.novell.ldapchai.ChaiPasswordPolicy). This method will first read the user's password policy using ChaiUser.getPasswordPolicy(), and use the default locale.

Parameters:
theUser - ChaiUser to read policy for
Returns:
A valid ChallengeSet if found, otherwise null.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the challenge set data, such as more randoms required then exist

readAssignedChallengeSet

public static ChallengeSet readAssignedChallengeSet(ChaiProvider provider,
                                                    ChaiPasswordPolicy passwordPolicy)
                                             throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                                                    ChaiOperationException,
                                                    ChaiValidationException
A convience wrapper for readAssignedChallengeSet(com.novell.ldapchai.provider.ChaiProvider, com.novell.ldapchai.ChaiPasswordPolicy, Locale). This use the default locale.

Parameters:
provider - provider used for ldap communication
passwordPolicy - the policy to examine to find a challenge set.
Returns:
A valid ChallengeSet if found, otherwise null.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the challenge set data, such as more randoms required then exist

readAssignedChallengeSet

public static ChallengeSet readAssignedChallengeSet(ChaiProvider provider,
                                                    ChaiPasswordPolicy passwordPolicy,
                                                    Locale locale)
                                             throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                                                    ChaiOperationException,
                                                    ChaiValidationException
Read the theUser's configured ChallengeSet from the directory. Operations are performed according to the ChaiConfiguration found by looking at the ChaiProvider underlying the ChaiEntry. For example, the setting ChaiSetting.EDIRECTORY_ENABLE_NMAS determines if NMAS calls are used to discover a universal password c/r policy.

This method is preferred over readAssignedChallengeSet(com.novell.ldapchai.ChaiUser), as it does not require a (possibly unneccessary) call to read the user's assigned password policy.

Parameters:
provider - provider used for ldap communication
passwordPolicy - the policy to examine to find a challenge set.
locale - desired retreival locale. If the stored ChallengeSet is internationalized, the appropriate localized strings will be returned.
Returns:
A valid ChallengeSet if found, otherwise null.
Throws:
ChaiOperationException - If there is an error during the operation
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the challenge set data, such as more randoms required then exist

readResponseSet

public static ResponseSet readResponseSet(ChaiUser user)
                                   throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                                          ChaiValidationException
readResponseSet(com.novell.ldapchai.ChaiUser, CrMode) where the provider's setting default mode is used.

Parameters:
user - ChaiUser to read responses for
Returns:
A valid ResponseSet if found, otherwise null.
Throws:
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the response set data, such as more randoms required then exist

readResponseSet

public static ResponseSet readResponseSet(ChaiUser user,
                                          CrMode responseMode)
                                   throws ChaiUnavailableException,
                                          ChaiValidationException
Read the user's configured ResponseSet from the directory.

A caller would typically use the returned ResponseSet for testing responses by calling the ResponseSet's ResponseSet#test(java.util.Map) method.

Parameters:
user - ChaiUser to read responses for
responseMode - Which type of response to read - note that any of the Chai types use the same exact method to read
Returns:
A valid ResponseSet if found, otherwise null.
Throws:
ChaiUnavailableException - If the directory server(s) are unavailable
ChaiValidationException - when there is a logical problem with the response set data, such as more randoms required then exist
